| HistoryText             = These team was brought together to act as the Protectors of the [[Monster King (Earth-616)|King]] of the new Monster Nation of [[Staten Island]]. After returning from one of their missions, they discovered [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] had killed their king and become the new monarch according to ancient Monster Law.{{r|Deadpool Vol 8 1}}

Although understandably hesitant at first, they eventually accepted Deadpool as their new leader and helped him defeat [[Last Son of Kraven (Earth-616)|Kraven the Hunter]] as he hunted for him.{{r|Deadpool Vol 8 1|4}}
